Texts.Eng: Now that I've assembled the new Prime Core, all that remains is for me to put all the pieces together.

^green;Using the Electromagnetic Extractor, I can extract Electric Components from mechanical enemies. ^white;I'll need at least ^orange;25 Electric Components ^white;if I am to rebuild the Prime Circuit. I'll also need ^orange;5 Sublime Trinkian Metal^white;, and a ^orange;Trinkian Power Core ^white;to supply the weapon with enough energy. Once I have all the components, I should ^green;craft a new ^orange;Prime Core ^green;at a Circuit Fabricator^white;.
